pages.text: fala uq'simu birabbi l-mashariqi wal-magharibi inna laqadiruna
ʿala an nubaddila khayran min'hum wama nahnu bimasbuqina
fadharhum yakhudu wayalʿabu hatta yulaqu yawmahumu alladhi yuʿaduna
yawma yakhrujuna mina l-ajdathi siraʿan ka-annahum ila nusubin yufiduna
khashiʿatan absaruhum tarhaquhum dhillatun dhalika l-yawmu alladhi kanu yuʿaduna
inna arsalna nuhan ila qawmihi an andhir qawmaka min qabli an yatiyahum ʿadhabun alimun
qala yaqawmi inni lakum nadhirun mubinun
yaghfir lakum min dhunubikum wayu-akhir'kum ila ajalin musamman inna ajala l-lahi idha jaa la yu-akharu law kuntum taʿlamuna
qala rabbi inni daʿawtu qawmi laylan wanaharan
wa-inni kullama daʿawtuhum litaghfira lahum jaʿalu asabiʿahum fi adhanihim wa-is'taghshaw thiyabahum wa-asarru wa-is'takbaru is'tik'baran
thumma inni aʿlantu lahum wa-asrartu lahum is'raran
faqul'tu is'taghfiru rabbakum innahu kana ghaffaran
